snippet.title: Sonic 1 Pilot - Release Video
snippet.description:
Before I send any download links, I would like to thank everyone that contributed to the project before it's cancellation. There's probably some I might have missed, since sadly due to the abrupt end of this project, I wasn't able to get a proper list of everyone who's contributed to this hack, and thus I can only list the following people:

Original Chris, for testing on hardware, doing art, music & giving feedback.
Speems for testing, music & feedback.
MCTravisYT for testing on hardware, art & giving feedback.
Inferno for coding help & testing.
Rivet for coding help & testing.
BladeOfChaos for testing & feedback.
ManiacShard for testing & feedback.
and somario360 for always somehow finding bugs every time which is incredible

I want to thank all of them for helping me in this project. Our efforts will not be going to waste, as assets, music and more have been reused for other projects of ours.
This project has taught me to take it easy, simple, and go slow. Think more about what you're gonna do first. Plan out things as much as you can if you don't know what you want to do before doing it.

With that being said, I want to leave with a fair warning. This hack is *incomplete*, and thus many aspects of the hack are very rough (this hack was cancelled early in development), and only two zones are fully beatable.

Download: https://www.mediafire.com/file/wnmcecuuhlaa38q/Sonic_The_Hedgehog_Pilot_%2528Cancelled%2529.bin/file
